 Inference from Theorem 19.23 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.)
statement:
exlimi.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
exlimi.2 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
exlimi $p |- ( E. x ph -> ps ) $.
